NCS powered by The Challenge
NCSTHECHALLENGE.ORG
Invitation to your NCS Information Evening
Hey {!Contact.FirstName},
Your NCS programme is almost here!
I’m {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_Mktg_lead_name__c}, your local NCS contact up until your NCS start date. I’d like to invite you and your parent or guardian to come to a short information evening.
It’s a chance to find out more about NCS, ask questions, and meet others who have signed up.
Date: {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_Date__c} Time: {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_time__c} Address: {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_venue_and_address__c}
Please let me know if you’re coming by sending an email to {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_SC_email_address__c} - or you can call or text me on {!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_Mktg_mobile_number__c}.
{!IF((Contact.Term_time_wave__c == TRUE),"","If you can’t make it but would still like to meet us, we’ll be holding other information evenings for NCS programmes running in different areas, or on different dates. Please contact me for details.
")} I look forward to seeing you at your information evening!
{!Wave_Selection__c.Info_Eve_Mktg_lead_name__c} The NCS Team - The Challenge
